name: Slim Fit Denim Trousers
shortDescription: These slim jeans, crafted from premium Japanese denim, are a wardrobe essential enhanced with the Louis Vuitton savoir-faire. With their timeless light blue wash and their easy silhouette, they can be effortlessly styled with any look. Exclusive details include tobacco-coloured topstitching, an embroidered LV signature on a rear pocket and signed nubuck patches on the ticket pocket and waist.
detailedDescription:
• 100% cotton
  • Dyed Indigo Blue
  • Slim fit
  • LV embroidery on back pocket
  • Nubuck LV patch on ticket pocket
  • Nubuck Damier jacqueron
  • Signature-engraved pearl-effect button in aged gold-colour setting
  • Damier fabric pocket lining and fit tag
  • Pearl-effect rivets
  • Button fly
  • Classic denim 5-pocket tailoring
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professional dry cleaning in hydrocarbons with KWL
  • Dry clean gently
  • Dry clean inside out in a net
  • Iron inside out with fabric in between
panelInformations.introduction: To maintain the quality of your Louis Vuitton product, we recommend that you follow the care instructions:

name: Embellished Evening Cigarette Trousers
shortDescription: These sleek black evening trousers cut from fine grain de poudre wool embody the elegance of the Spring-Summer 2025 Show’s dandy diplomat. Made to order with an elegant cigarette fit, they are richly embellished with glittering crystal and bead-embroidered bands on the waist and legs. A matching jacket makes a chic tuxedo evening suit.
detailedDescription:
• 100% wool
  • Black 
  • Regular fit
  • 2 Italian pockets on the side
  • 2 piped back pockets
  • Crystal and pearl-embroidered bands on the waist and legs
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:

name: Tailored Wool Cargo Trousers
shortDescription: These cargo trousers from the Spring-Summer 2025 Show are tailored from fine black grain de poudre wool fabric, with handy zipped pockets on the outside of each leg featuring tone-on-tone LV embroidery on the left. Combining elegance with utility, this versatile design can complete a wide range of looks.
detailedDescription:
• 100% wool
  • Black 
  • Relaxed fit
  • 2 Italian pockets
  • 2 patch pockets on the sides with zips
  • 2 piped back pockets
  • Signature embroidery on the left pocket

name: Flocked Damier Technical Track Trousers
shortDescription: These black track trousers from the Spring-Summer 2025 Show offer a chic twist on a sportswear classic. The lustrous technical fabric is adorned with a flocked matte Damier motif incorporating Marque L.Vuitton Déposée signatures, while sweeping velvety bands add to the play of textures. Both comfortable and refined, these trousers make a sleek travel set paired with a matching top.
detailedDescription:
• 100% polyamide
  • Deep Black
  • Regular fit
  • Sporty cut with velvet inserts
  • Elasticated waist and cuffs
  • 2 Italian pockets with mesh lining
  • Flocked signature all over
  • Tone-on-tone embroidered eyelets
  • Made in Italy

name: Graphic Jacquard Fluid Shorts
shortDescription: The embodiment of relaxed elegance, these shorts are crafted in a richly textured jacquard, featuring the Spring-Summer 2025 Show’s tone-on-tone black Damoflage motif. An elasticated waistband ensures comfort, while a bead embroidered LV signature patch adds a sophisticated finishing touch. These shorts can be styled with a matching short-sleeved shirt for a chic day-to-evening look.

  • Black

name: Bead-Embellished Silk Pyjama Trousers
shortDescription: These black silk pyjama trousers embody the effortless elegance of the Spring-Summer 2025 runway. Two front pleats enhance the fluid drape of the silk twill, while a bead-embroidered signature adorns the left pocket. A line of silvery beads adds a sophisticated finishing touch down the outside of each leg. A matching shirt and jacket make a chic evening ensemble.

  • Black
  • Relaxed fit
  • Striped monochrome jacquard twill
  • Silver beaded trim down each leg
  • 2 Italian pockets on the sides

name: Wool-Silk Blend Monogram Evening Cigarette Trousers
shortDescription: These tailored cigarette trousers are inspired by the Spring-Summer 2025 Show’s dandy diplomat. Their elegant silhouette is crafted from a luxurious wool-silk blend jacquard in mid-brown tones, featuring an all-over Mini Monogram Flower motif with a coppery lustre. Paired with a matching jacket, these trousers can be worn as part of a sophisticated evening tuxedo.
